name: Healthcare Modern
description: Clean but conservative design for nurses and allied health professionals. Green accents with focus on patient care and clinical outcomes.

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Dedicated registered nurse with 8+ years critical care experience in ICU and emergency departments. AHPRA registered with advanced certifications in critical care nursing, trauma response, and patient advocacy. Committed to evidence-based practice and delivering compassionate patient-centred care.

jobs.title: Senior Registered Nurse - ICU
bullets: Provide direct nursing care for critically ill patients in 32-bed Level 6 ICU
Mentor new graduate nurses and coordinate clinical placements for nursing students
Lead quality improvement initiatives reducing catheter-associated infections by 30%
Participate in multidisciplinary rounds and contribute to treatment planning decisions

jobs.title: Registered Nurse - Emergency Department
bullets: Triaged and managed acute presentations in high-volume metropolitan ED
Administered emergency medications and assisted with life-saving procedures
Provided trauma nursing care and supported families during crisis situations
Maintained 95%+ patient satisfaction scores through compassionate care delivery

sections.title: Certifications
certifications: Graduate Certificate in Critical Care Nursing - University of Technology Sydney

sections.title: Professional Development
development: Australian College of Critical Care Nurses Annual Conference (2023, 2022, 2021)
Sepsis Recognition and Management Workshop - NSW Health (2023)
Mental Health First Aid Training - Beyond Blue (2022)
